page.title: 14FARM SHOPS
page.content: Near the edge of Blofield there are two farm shops. These combine two activities. Near the shops,which are barns, there are fields of fruit and vegetables where at the appropriate season you are able to go and pick_your_own. Many people come from around Norwich to pick fruit such as strawberries,raspberries,gooseberries and black currents, which they want to put in a freezer or make into jam or wine. These crops are much cheaper than those in the shops or market in Norwich. Vegetables that you can pick include beetroot, calabrese, peas and beans. The farm shops also sell fruit and vegetables, some of which come from overseas, such as oranges, apples and peaches.
